analysis.key_quote: The abusive expansion of Schedule F into positions it was never intended for is a frightening further advancement towards full authoritarianism by the current Executive branch administration and will significantly damage the ability of the Federal workforce to apolitically serve the American people.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about authoritarianism and the politicization of the federal workforce, indicating a defense of nonpartisan service.
